DAO<T> - Interface in datastorage
 
DAOFactory - Class in datastorage
Singleton Object that handles access to DAO objects from all classes
DAOimp<T> - Class in datastorage
Implements methods of DAO that wont change on extending DAOImp
DAOimp(Connection) - Constructor for class datastorage.DAOimp
 
datastorage - package datastorage
 
DateConverter - Class in utils
Class to Convert Dates to String and vice versa
DateConverter() - Constructor for class utils.DateConverter
 
decrypt(String) - Method in class encryption.AES
decrypts a string based on AES encryption
decrypt(String) - Method in class encryption.EncryptionMethod
decrypts a string
deleteAllLocked(LocalDate) - Method in class datastorage.PatientDAO
deletes all records from the patient table, that are locked and older than the parameter date
deleteAllLockedWithPid(int) - Method in class datastorage.TreatmentDAO
executes a delete for any treatment which is matching the key and is being locked
deleteById(int) - Method in interface datastorage.DAO
 
deleteById(int) - Method in class datastorage.DAOimp
 
deleteByPid(int) - Method in class datastorage.TreatmentDAO
executes a delete statement for any treatment wich is matching the key
DeleteManager - Class in utils
Class for deleting old locked data based in DSGVO standards
deleteOldData() - Static method in class utils.DeleteManager
deletes all patient specific data, that have to be locked for at least 10 years
